title: Blended e-Learning Course for Evidence-Based Medical Practice Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Clinical Medicine Knowledge and Basic Research Methodology Concepts
context.additional_context: Customized course for healthcare professionals primarily using smartphones, combining real-time sessions with mobile-optimized learning materials

learning_goals: Learners can explain the five-step Evidence-Based Medicine (EBM) process—formulating questions, literature search, critical appraisal, application, and evaluation—with 80% accuracy.
Learners can construct research questions using the PICO framework (Patient/Population, Intervention, Comparison, Outcome) based on real clinical scenarios.
Learners pass formative assessments that critically evaluate research papers provided on a smartphone-based platform and determine their applicability to practice with at least 75% accuracy.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
